name: @ferg-cod3s/codeflow
description: CLI tool to convert base-agents, commands, and skills to OpenCode format with advanced optimization and parallel processing

scripts.lint:fix: echo 'No auto-fix available - fix TypeScript errors manually'
scripts.quality: bun run typecheck && bun run test:coverage
scripts.prepublishOnly: bun run quality && bun run build:cli
scripts.release: bun run quality && bun run build:cli && git add . && git commit -m "chore: update build for release" && git tag -a v$(npm pkg get version) -m "Release v$(npm pkg get version)" && echo "‚úÖ Release v$(npm pkg get version) ready for push"
scripts.release:dry: bun run quality && bun run build:cli && echo "üîç Dry run completed - ready for release"
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --follow-tags && npm publish

author: CodeFlow
